624:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena arhadbhikṣusahasreṇa,
624:5: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhānāṃ paripūrṇairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavinivartanīyairanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
624:11: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto'ruṇodgatakālasamaye svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmat|
624:12: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya|
624:13: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya|
624:19: anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
624:21: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat|
624:22: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma-kutastvaṃ śāradvatīputra kalyamevāgatya tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ ?
624:23: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-sarvaprathamataraṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ,
624:25: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-satyaṃ kila tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca ?
624:29: upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya|
624:31: tathā hi bhagavan atṛpto'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca|
624:32: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
624:38: yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse|
624:39: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca|
624:40: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi|
624:51: na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
624:59: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca|
624:60: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi ?
624:62: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi||
624:65: yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā|
624:66: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā|
624:69: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ|
624:71: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi|
624:73: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā|
624:74: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ-kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā ?
624:75: sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin buddhakṣetre gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ,
624:76: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,
624:77: ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,
624:79: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate|
624:81: sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate||
624:82: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,
624:84: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sattvānupalabdhiḥ,
624:88: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ||
624:89: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ,
624:93: mañjuśrīrāha-tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti|
624:95: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yatpramāṇo buddhaviṣayaḥ [iti]||
624:96: bhagavānāha-sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet-kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
624:98: mañjuśrīrāha-tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā [iti]||
624:99: bhagavānāha-sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet-kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
624:101: mañjuśrīrāha-tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yatpratiṣṭhito'nutpādadhātuḥ tatpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti||
624:102: bhagavānāha-yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
624:108: bhagavānāha-yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
624:109: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā ?
624:110: mañjuśrīrāha-na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā|
624:111: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati|
624:113: yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā|
624:114: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti,
624:117: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā|
624:118: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān|
624:120: tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi,
624:124: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā|
624:125: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate|
624:127: na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā|
624:130: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā|
624:131: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti|
624:134: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān|
624:135: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate,
624:139: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti|
624:140: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt|
624:142: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati|
624:144: na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā,
624:146: yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā|
624:148: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ ?
624:150: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ ?
624:152: mañjuśrīrāha-tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate ?
624:158: tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate|
624:160: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate|
624:164: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte|
624:169: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā-ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
624:173: tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate,
624:180: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ kāmadhātuḥ,
624:185: tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ,
624:188: punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti|
624:189: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī,
624:191: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ,
624:194: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi|
624:195: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
624:197: aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya|
624:198: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
624:199: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante|
624:200: api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
624:201: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
624:203: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat-pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ|
624:206: mañjuśrīrāha- eṣā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim|
624:214: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ|
624:218: bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate|
624:219: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā||
624:223: bahubuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāste bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpātsyante||
624:224: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati|
624:226: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti,
624:231: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ ?
624:235: mañjuśrīrāha-kaścitpunarbhagavan sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ ?
624:237: mañjuśrīrāha-bhagavan tava tāvadete buddhadharmā iti nāma na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
624:251: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
624:252: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante||
624:253: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
624:259: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat-buddhā eva te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ,
624:264: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat-na te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pṛthagjanadharmān śrāvakadharmān pratyekabuddhadharmān samyaksaṃbuddhadharmānadhyāmbiṣyante,
624:268: tathā hi bhagavan nirālambāḥ sarvadharmā asaṃvidyamānatvāt|
624:270: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma-evametacchāradvatīputra, evametat|
624:274: avinivartanīyabhūmau tvaṃ śāradvatīputra pratiṣṭhitāṃstān kulaputrān kuladuhitaraśca jānīṣva,
624:278: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ|
624:279: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ paramaviśiṣṭaśīlaguṇapathaprāptāḥ,
624:286: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
624:289: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat-kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan icchasyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum ?
624:295: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
624:300: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam ?
624:303: mañjuśrīrāha-tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi,
624:313: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi,
624:315: mañjuśrīrāha- bodhisattva iti bhadanta śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
624:316: bodhāya saṃprasthita iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi|
624:317: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi|
624:318: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi|
624:320: śāradvatīputra āha-tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi ?
624:323: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam ?
624:329: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti|
624:330: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti|
624:331: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum- iyaṃ vāgiti,
624:333: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi-kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti,
624:334: yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
624:335: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
624:336: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti|
624:337: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ|
624:339: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
624:346: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam||
624:347: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ|
624:348: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino'pyarhanta ājñāsyanti|
624:368: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra dharmadhātureva bhagavān|
624:371: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ|
624:379: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā|
624:384: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran|
624:399: na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate|
624:402: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati|
624:405: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum|
624:406: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum|
624:407: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum|
624:408: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum|
624:413: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi-asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate|
624:419: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi-anuttīrṇabhaya iti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanamiti||
624:421: mañjuśrīrāha-yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ,
624:424: mañjuśrīrāha-avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam|
624:428: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi- avinīto bhikṣuriti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam||
624:429: śāradvatīputra āha- adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam ?
624:430: mañjuśrīrāha- adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam|
624:431: śāradvatīputra āha- kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi ?
624:433: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
624:438: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā|
624:439: anena bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan||
624:440: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-syānmañjuśrīḥ paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo'bhavyo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum ?
624:441: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum|
624:443: tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate|
624:451: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum||
624:452: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam ?
624:455: tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt|
624:466: api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā ?)
624:468: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ mamāntike evaṃ bhavati-tathāgato me tathāgata iti ?
624:471: na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet-tathāgato me tathāgata iti|
624:473: [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā,
624:475: tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ vijñapayati,
624:480: tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati-tathāgato me tathāgata iti|
624:481: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat|
624:482: tat kataro'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati-tathāgato me tathāgata iti ?
624:489: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati-utpannastathāgata iti?
624:492: bhagavānāha-nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā iti ?
624:493: mañjuśrīrāha-kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā buddha bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ ?
624:498: mañjuśrīrāha-tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ|
624:500: tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ|
624:501: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā|
624:503: ye'pi te anāgate'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti,
624:506: na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā|
624:508: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati- utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti||
624:509: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam,
624:510: acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ,
624:511: avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya|
624:517: mañjuśrīrāha-acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati vā ?
624:537: tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha-ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ ime āryadharmā iti||
624:538: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam ?
624:544: bhagavānāha- icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam-ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti ?
624:545: mañjuśrīrāha-iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam-ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
624:547: na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ|
624:554: bhagavānāha-na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi-anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti ?
624:559: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate|
624:561: tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate|
624:562: bhagavānāha-kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi-tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti ?
624:565: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo'bhūt,
624:567: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam||
624:568: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
624:569: kaḥ pratyayo'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya ?
624:570: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat-ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pūrvakairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhāṣitaḥ|
624:572: ayaṃ pratyayo'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya||
